item.title: Noam Chomsky - The Crimes of U.S. Presidents
item.description:
Noam Chomsky - The Crimes of U.S. Presidents

"If the Nuremberg laws were applied, then every post-war American president would have been hanged." â€• Noam Chomsky

item.title: The War You Don't See
item.description:
The War You Don't See

2015 - 'The Coming War' - Contribute to John Pilger's new documentary project here bit.ly/PilgerMovie Buy The War You Don't See on DVD - http://networkonair.com/shop/1271-john-pilger-the-war-you-don-t-see.html or as a download at https://vimeo.com/ondemand/waryoudontsee John Pilger's 'The War You Don't See' (2011) is a powerful and timely investigation into the media's role in war, tracing the history of 'embedded' and independent reporting from the carnage of World War One to the destruction of Hiroshima, and from the invasion of Vietnam to the current war in Afghanistan and disaster in Iraq.

item.title: WARNING: Commercial Short Positions In Gold & Silver Hit All-Time Record! - King World News
item.description:
WARNING: Commercial Short Positions In Gold & Silver Hit All-Time Record! - King World News

On the heels of some fierce trading this week in the dollar, gold and silver, below is an extremely important update on the war that is raging in the gold and silver markets. The following charts are from Jason Goepfert at SentimenTrader. Commercial Short Positions In Silver Hit All-Time Record Highs!
